title: Colombia Overnight Interbank Rate
description: Colombia Overnight Interbank Rate was at 11.01 percent on Wednesday November 9. Interbank Rate in Colombia averaged 5.64 percent from 2001 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 13.50 percent in January of 2001 and a record low of 1.65 percent in March of 2021. In Colombia, the interbank rate is the rate of interest charged on short-term loans made between banks. This page provides - Colombia Overnight Interbank Rate - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Banco de la Republica de Colombia
